creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a young Black man seen in profile from PL, with head turned toward PR, wearing a white t-shirt and pants, with a striped cloth or shirt in his back pants pocket
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Boy in White Shirt, West Oakland, CA
